name: TapUp
description:
Mixing the clicker and runner will allow you to experience the unforgettable pleasure of the process, and crush your fingers.

The main process consists in passing the distance, on the way of passing it you will encounter a variety of obstacles that do not allow you to master the space.
features:
-Nice graphics
-Simple gameplay
-Combining genres Runner&Clicker

How play?
- Aviod obstacles or overcome them
- Maintain the fuel level by clicking on the screen
- Catch the cylindres to replenish the fuel

How long you can survive? Enjoy.🚀
